trends: There have been 4 other sightings in McMinnville
There were no other sightings in McMinnville on or around September 2nd 2008
divs: Sighting Detailsi was siting in the back yard of my work smokeing a ciggaret with my coworker when i looked up in to the northwestern part of the sky in the back yard of my work and saw a blue whit light going across the sky it was bright enough that it drew my attn to it cause i was not orginally looking at the sky it contniued on a straight path moveing slow for about 30 secondsthen the light that it was imiteing began to shrink in on its self till it dissapred i called my coworkers attn to the spot where the light winked out at as me and my coworker were standing there talking about what i had seen we were both looking at the spot in the sky where the light had winked out at when there was a sudden bright flash in the spot it winked out in
